context_bundle.summary: Tauri WebView2 integration - window creation, navigation, cookie access for auth flows.

onboarding.quick_start: WebviewBuilder::new() for custom webview with cookie access
common_patterns: on_navigation event to detect OAuth redirect
webview.eval() for JS injection to read cookies
Cookie access via JS: document.cookie in webview context
known_errors: HttpOnly cookies not visible to JS - need Tauri 2 cookie API
WebView2 caches aggressively - clear for fresh auth
